synonyms: viṣṇu-mūrti—Lord Viṣṇu; gadā—club; padma—lotus; śaṅkha—conch; cakra—disc; kara—in the hands; madhusūdana—Lord Madhusūdana; cakra—disc; śaṅkha—conch; padma—lotus; gadā—club; dhara—holding.
translation: "Lord Viṣṇu holds the club, lotus, conch and disc. Lord Madhusūdana holds the disc, conch, lotus and club.
